headline.main: Union for Peace Urged Now; Pooling of All the Interests of Nations Entering It Recommended

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: We are committed to a program of all aid for Britain short of war and are rapidly approaching a situation which will automatically eliminate this last qualifying phrase. Indeed, many writers declare that we have for some time been engaged in the modern undercover, undeclared form of war.
abstract: U S immediate leadership to promote World Fed Union for peace urged, lr
